creator: ushakov@int.com.ru
text:
It is sometimes useful to suppress all logging activity without letting it out 
to System.out. This is especially useful for embedded system implementations.

A subclass of org.apache.catalina.logger.LoggerBase is proposed that absorbs 
all messages being logged.

An implementation is attached.

Created attachment 1648
LoggerVoid.java - a proposed implementation
creator: ushakov@int.com.ru
markt@apache.org
text: All current versions of Tomcat (5.5.x onwards) use logging frameworks that allow all logging to be suppressed if required.
